title: Mobile-Based Grammar Learning: Blended Education Course Utilizing Cognitive Theory and Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Foundational grammar instruction for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to improve workplace documentation skills.

learning_goals: Learners identify tense and sentence structure errors with over 80% accuracy using multimedia materials provided on mobile platforms
Learners maintain a weekly learning participation rate of over 90% through a motivation system (gamification elements, real-time feedback)
Learners achieve an average score of over 85 points in formative assessments based on a cloud-fog-edge integrated system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
